title: Unknown Woodland/Druid buff?
body: I had a Neeko on the backline, though for some reason the game thought I had it on the board. It gave me woodlands and druid buff, although I don't know how it happened, just noticed it after a while.

replies.body: I came here to report just this. I have had it happen a few times now. Always seemed to happen with Neko. Most current I had a 2 star Maokai and 2 star Ivern and 1 star Neko. Sold my neko and still had the 3 woodland and druid buff. Not sure about druid buff but Woodland was still working. Got a extra Ivern next battle phase.
Did it actually give you the synergies, or was it a visual bug?
